com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Interface IBaseOperationPlugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin, IHMUserOperationPlugin, IMarkNotAMatchOperationPlugin, IMergeOperationPlugin, IOpenOperationPlugin, ISaveOperationPlugin, ISendForApproveOperationPlugin, ITaskOperationPlugin, IUserOperationPlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBaseOperationPlugin

    public interface IBaseOperationPlugin

    Base class for BDD user exits.

    Defines the common methods for all user exits.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OperationContext getOperationContext()
      Returns the operation context for this class.
      OperationType getOperationType()
      Returns the type of the operation.

    • Method Detail

      • getOperationType

        OperationType getOperationType()
        Returns the type of the operation. Every operation handler (Save, Merge, etc) is implemented by a single class (an ancestor of this interface) and operation type,
        Returns:
        type of operation that is handled by this class
        See Also:
        OperationType

      • getOperationContext

        OperationContext getOperationContext()

        Returns the operation context for this class. Additional operation or * context-specific information. The context is a holder of name / value pairs where context-specific information could be stored.

        In cases where context is needed, BDD would obtain context from operation handler implementation and put additional data to it.

        Returns:
        OperationContext instance for this class.
        See Also:
        OperationContext
